channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Urgent Safety Complaint Regarding Malfunctioning Lift Door, 3rd July
item.description:
Lift door crushed my hand when trying to hold it. It didn’t stop or reverse. Nearly lost 4 fingers. Please inspect it immediately—this poses a serious risk to all residents.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household items dumped on street, 3rd July
item.description:
Somebody has dumped and then tipped out bags of rubbish in the street. When will Hackney Council get a grip on fly tipping its happening every day in the area?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Elderfield Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 3rd July
item.description:
A pallet and cardboard dumped near 31 Compton place
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Compton Place, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Further works required re "Give Way" sign?, 3rd July
item.description:
Original ref:-7544413. First reported 9.5.25. Some work subsequently undertaken but feedback received 17.6.25 from LBB that "Further works are necessary to resolve the issue and have been scheduled for action". What is the timescale for these works to be completed please at this high risk junction?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Madeira Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Five large cooking oil can discarded at different points on the street, 3rd July
item.description:
It's unhygienic and probably from a local restaurant. They should be recycling the cans and they should be paying the council to do so. This has happened on a number of occasions previously. One time the can was full of hot coals which reignited.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped food waste bins, 3rd July
item.description:
These food waste bins have been dumped on the pavement the past three weeks. It is staring to attract further littering and attracting flies. Please arrange removal.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Philips Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees growing over and across roof of private house, 3rd July
item.description:
Tree branches on the green immediately next to number 41 Buttermere Road are hanging over and halfway across the roof of the house and are definitely in need of pruning cutting back. Should these fall onto roof of number 41 or adjoining property 39, the council can be held liable after being notified of any damage this may cause. Please rectify as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Buttermere Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: About 8 inches wide but deep ,on the pavement.It is getting bigger., 3rd July
item.description:
The hole is where some years ago a tree had been taken down.It is on the pavement outside 61 Ridgeway drive.BR15DG.A dip has developed along side the hole and could be very dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridgeway Drive, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged tree, 3rd July
item.description:
The tree outside 28 Sidney Road has a chunk missing from the base of the trunk. I wonder if the tree would fall over if it is hit again. I noticed this 02.07.2025

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sidney Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned silver Mercedes, 3rd July
item.description:
Abandoned silver Mercedes (reg: KY02 VUC) in Winslade House car park (E5 9LA). Vehicle is very dirty, has a missing wing mirror, flat tyre, and appears unused for a long time.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Upper Clapton Road, Hackney, London

item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.description:
Lots of items fly tipped and is blocking the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mottingham Lane, London

item.title: Numerous 10 inch pot holes on Elsa Road, 3rd July
item.description:
There are numerous pot holes down Elsa road which have caused significant damage to my car and continue to be a danger to road users who frequent that road. It’s unsafe to leave such a busy road with that many pot holes especially as it is a cut through road from welling to bexleyheath and is also a road with a large secondary school on which again causes a danger during rush hour.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stevedale Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TIME EXPIRED 18 May roadworks sign….., 3rd July
item.description:
…..seen from bus SIX WEEKS later…. Please remove FORTHWITH and URGENTLY IMPROVE management of these signs….. See attached photos….

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sidcup By-pass, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No.19 Stevedale Road, 3rd July
item.description:
Occupants at this house are continuing to dump their rubbish from their building business in their front garden. this is causing a severe rat infestation and therefore effecting neighbouring properties encouraging areas for rats to thrive in. something needs to be done urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stevedale Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars turning without looking - dangerous due to bus stop passengers crossing, 3rd July
item.description:
Street needs traffic calming (eg widened pavements) to prevent cars turning in at speed when pedestrians are crossing. There is a bus stop here that serves the area to the South which means that this is causing an issue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Galleywall Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet
